> We'll take the report for our records and the potential information
> value to other Heritrix uses, but for such a JVM crash (addressing 
error),
> there must be a responsible JVM bug -- we make no native callouts 
that
> could trigger a SIGSEGV.
> 
> So I would be sure to also report this to Sun, and check the Sun
> forums to see if others are having the same problem.
> 
> Did you recently move to "Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM (1.5.0_01-b08 
mixed mode)"
> by any chance?


Been using this version for about 2 weeks now.  This was the first 
time we saw an issue.  So now I'm running one box with 1.5 and one 
with 1.4 and neither has crashed since the earlier post.



> 
> You might also want to try leaving off the -server VM option; as it
> changes the JVM behavior it could step around whatever bug is 
causing
> the crash.


Will do.

Thanks for the comments,
Greg
